Package Documentation

Class Rectangle

java.lang.Object
Documentation.Rectangle
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cuboid
class Rectangle extends Object
A Rectangle class representing a 2-D Figure having length and Breadth.
Since:
2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ansh-Vikalp
